body_html:
Hey @yoasyo25 👋 awesome that you wanna help and welcome to the Teams App 💚

And yes, this issue is free to grab (I don't remember anyone working on it), so feel free to try fixing it! If you need any help or any further information, just ping us here 📞

Small sidenote, since this may eventually not be obvious from the issue's title and description: we don't want to add an upload mechanism for avatars (as @carpodaster wrote in his comment 👆 ) but rather "just" have the app pull in the right and updated image from Github ✌️

body:
Hey @yoasyo25 👋 awesome that you wanna help and welcome to the Teams App 💚 

And yes, this issue is free to grab _(I don't remember anyone working on it)_, so feel free to try fixing it! If you need any help or any further information, just ping us here 📞 

Small sidenote, since this may eventually not be obvious from the issue's title and description: we don't want to add an upload mechanism for avatars (as @carpodaster wrote in his comment 👆 ) but rather *"just"* have the app pull in the right and updated image from Github ✌️
